tooltip.placementutil.item.temporary_wan: Right click to place a self-destructing Temporary Block. §7§oUnlimited uses
tooltip.placementutil.item.angel_wand: While holding in your offhand, you can place many blocks as if they were angel Temporary Blocks. The distance you place the block is changeable. §7§oUpgradeable
tooltip.placementutil.item.temporary_blo: Just like a returning Temporary Block, but you can place it midair.
tooltip.placementutil.item.angel_addon_r: An add-on for the Angel Wand to increase its max reach by 1 Block each (max amount is configurable).
tooltip.placementutil.item.angel_addon_b: An add-on for the Angel Wand to remove the Mining Fatigue effect while holding an Angel Wand in your offhand.
tooltip.placementutil.item.angel_addon_r: An add-on for the Angel Wand to add a feature to rotate blocks you are looking at.
tooltip.placementutil.block.temporary_bl: A block that you can walk through and break instantly. It's used to place other blocks while building.
Just like a default Temporary Block, but it will go straight into your inventory after breaking.
Just like a default Temporary Block, but it automatically disappears after 10 seconds (alternatively disappears on Random Tick if you configure it that way). §7§oOnly used by the Temporary Wand.
